text.section: Except as provided in § 8-202(d)(2) of this subtitle, employment performed by a crew member or officer of a vessel on the navigable waters of the United States is not covered employment if the vessel has a capacity of 10 net tons or less.

Employment is not covered employment if:
performed by a crew member or officer of:
a vessel with a capacity of 10 net tons or less; or
a fishing boat that has a crew that normally consists of fewer than 10 individuals;
the crew member or officer is engaged in the farming or taking of any aquatic life; and
the crew member or officer is paid on a share basis and not by a salary.
